== Activities ==

As part of the Advocacy part of the NGO team's activities, we:
* Interview NGOs to discover their needs. (<nowiki>[[czajkowski]]</nowiki>)
* Record Case Studies of NGO implementations,
** <nowiki>[[NGO-CaseStudy-Template]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[NGO-CaseStudy]]</nowiki>
* Liaise with NGOs long-term to keep track of development,
** Whenever we get notified about NGO specific bugs or generally bugs that affect NGOs, please make sure you add a the `ngo` tag in the Launchpad bug.

## Add the "ngo" tag <<BR>> <nowiki>[[File:ngotag2.png]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=ngo|List of NGO related bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Creating Paper Jams for NGOs. (<nowiki>[[czajkowski]]</nowiki>)
* Invite NGOs to !LoCos,
* Maintain the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntungo.wordpress.com|NGO Blog]]</nowiki>.
